definition[0]: dirt, mud, or another sticky substance that makes something dirty
example[0]: Come on, let’s wipe that muck off your face.
definition[1]: waste matter from animals, sometimes put on land to make plants grow better
example[1]: special machinery for spreading muck onto the fields
definition[2]: something that is unpleasant or of very bad quality
example[3]: How can you eat that muck? It looks disgusting.
example[4]: I’m not surprised she left. He treated her like muck  (=very badly).
